definitions.definition: An instrument used in surgery or medical procedures for grasping and holding objects, similar to tongs or pincers .
A pair of appendages on the abdomen of some insects, such as earwigs , resembling the medical instrument.

main_definition: An instrument used in surgery or medical procedures for grasping and holding objects, similar to tongs or pincers .
secondary_definitions: ( entomology ) A pair of appendages on the abdomen of some insects, such as earwigs , resembling the medical instrument.
